column2: Cache<ref name="cache" group=Note>Reduces disk usage  file fragmentation (in case it is not preallocated) and latencies due to larger written blocks and cached data for hash checking finished pieces.</ref>
column3: Web seeding <ref name="webseed" group="Note">Recently implemented (unofficial) web seeding feature  see HTTP-Based Seeding Specification</ref>

column10: No built-in cache-disk cache but a delayed sync
